title: Your Favorite Sites
content:
Just wondering what sites you guys view regularly - any design community stuff etc.

No links to Typophile please :)
author: jayyy

comments.content:
A collection of Typo/Design blogs on the TypoWiki:

[http://typophile.com/node/12012](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/typophile.com/node/12012 "http://typophile.com/node/12012")

Here's a few that I use oftenr than others:

- [Smashing Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.smashingmagazine.com/) for looking at current trends, free stuff.
- [PSDTuts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/psdtuts.com/) for when what I want isn't available elsewhere for free, I might as well make it myself.
- [Ascii-table.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/ascii-table.com/html-table.php) for when I need to add an ASCII/UNICODE character to a website.
- [CSS-Tricks.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/css-tricks.com/) for good tutorials and techniques regarding design and javascript.
Hi, I don't have time to view any website regularly but I like many of the websites.

I like:

The [Design Matters Podcast](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.sterlingbrands.com/DesignMatters.html)

[Under Consideration](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.underconsideration.com/)

and their site [Speak Up](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.underconsideration.com/speakup/)

QBN's [Newstoday](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.qbn.com/)

and for wasting time or random questions and answers:

[YayHooray](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.yayhooray.com/)

Sites I visit other than the Typophile:

\ [Design Taxi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.designtaxi.com/) - keeps you up-to-date with the latest design happenings  
\ [Mograph](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/typophile.com/wiki/mograph.net/) - a place for the Motion Graphics lovers  
\ [Under Consideration](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.underconsideration.com/) - Design in general  
\ [Netdiver](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/netdiver.net/) - a website full of inspiring portfolios  
\ [NotCot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085503/http:/www.notcot.com/) - a visual filtration of ideas + aesthetics + amusements
